songs.title: Is Your Love Enough?
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Jade Thirlwall & Perrie Edwards]
Is your love enough?
Come on, make me believe it
Is your love enough? Ah
Can you keep me up
All the way through the evening?
Is your love enough? Ah

[Verse 1: Jesy Nelson]
It's gettin' late but you don't mind it
I call and say "I'm almost there"
Got your anticipation rising, ah
I wanna love you everywhere

[Pre-Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Jade Thirlwall + All]
One kiss, you're falling in love
(Are you up for this? Are you up for this?)
Too much is never too much
(Can you handle this? Can you handle this?)
Three nights in a row, I don't stop
(Are you down for it? Are you down for it?)
You can do more than talking baby (Shh)

[Chorus: Jade Thirlwall & Perrie Edwards]
Is your love enough?
Come on, make me believe it
Is your love enough? Ah
Can you keep me up
All the way through the evening?
Is your love enough? Ah

[Verse 2: Jade Thirlwall with Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
You pull me in and say you want me (Oh, yeah-ah)
I need to see how deep it goes (See how deep it goes)
You whisper in my ear, you love me (Ahh)
Is it enough, I wanna know?

[Pre-Chorus: Perrie Edwards & Jade Thirlwall + All]
One kiss, you're falling in love
(Are you up for this? Are you up for this?)
Too much is never too much
(Can you handle this? Can you handle this?)
Three nights in a row, I don't stop
(Are you down for it? Are you down for it?)
You can do more than talking baby (Shh)

[Chorus: Jade Thirlwall with Perrie Edwards & Jade Thirlwall]
Is your love enough?
Come on, make me believe it
Is your love enough? Aah
Can you keep me up
All the way through the evening?
Is your love (Your love) enough? (Enough), ah (No, oh)

[Post-Chorus: Jade Thirlwall with Perrie Edwards & Jade Thirlwall]
Is your love enough?
Na, na, na, na, na, na, eh
Is your love enough?
Na, na, na, na, na, na, eh
Is your love enough?
Na, na, na, na, na, na, eh
Is your love enough? (Is your love enough?), ah

[Bridge: Perrie Edwards]
I, I want, want to know, know
If you can handle all, all of me
I, I want, want to know, know
If you can handle all, all of me

[Chorus: Jade Thirlwall with Perrie Edwards, Jade Thirlwall, Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Perrie Edwards]
Is your love enough?
Come on, make me believe it
Is your love enough? Ah (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
Can you keep me up
All the way through the evening?
Is your love enough? Ah
(Oh, oh, your love)
Is your love enough?
Come on, make me believe it
Is your love enough? Ah (Is your love enough?)
Can you keep me up
All the way through the evening? (All the way through the evening)
Is your love (Your love) enough? (Enough) Ah (Ohh)

[Post-Chorus: Jade Thirlwall with Perrie Edwards, Jade Thirlwall & Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
Is your love enough?
(Ahh, ahh, ahh, ahh, yeah)
Na, na, na, na, na, na, eh
Is your love enough?
(Ahh, ahh, ahh, ahh, yeah)
Na, na, na, na, na, na, eh
Is your love enough?
(Ahh, ahh, ahh, ahh, yeah) (Ooh, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, yeah)
(Yeah, yeah, yeah)
Na, na, na, na, na, na, eh
Is your love enough? Ah
